chapters.title: Chapter 4: A Sense of Humor
chapters.info: High Lord Simaan, p. 100 (126)—A Leader of Tairen military forces in Cairhien. He is one of the High Lords of Tear. When the battle in Cairhien was over, he and a few other High Lords took to hiding in Haddon Mirk—they are traitors to the Dragon Reborn.
